posts.post_content:
Reds best answer to large threats like the five M11 Titans. Can act as sort of pseudo removal with any sacrifice effects like [Fling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Fling), [Bloodthrone Vampire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Bloodthrone Vampire) or [Kuldotha Rebirth](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kuldotha Rebirth) (say goodbye Darksteel Juggernaut)  
  
It would be hilarious to steal a [Blightsteel Titan](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blightsteel Titan) and swing for lethal poison damage.
